ch.iserver.ace.net.discovery.dnssd
Class Register

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.discovery.dnssd.Register

public class Register
extends Object

DNSSDCall implementation for a DNSSD register call. This call registers a service (i.e.user) with DNSSD to be discovered by other users and to receive discovery events such as userDiscovered or userDiscarded.

Register is used by the user registration process.

See Also:
DNSSDCall

Register

public Register(String serviceName,
                String registrationType,
                int port,
                com.apple.dnssd.TXTRecord txt,
                com.apple.dnssd.RegisterListener listener)
Creates a new Register DNSSD call.

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name to be registered
registrationType - the registration type being registered
port - the port on which the service accepts connections
txt - the txt record rdata
listener - this object will get called when the service is registered

execute

public Object execute()
               throws DNSSDUnavailable
Executes the DNSSD call. In case of failure, a RetryStrategy determines how many times the call should be retried. If an Error is thrown, is called.

Returns:
Object the value returned by the DNSSD call
Throws:
DNSSDUnavailable - if the call failed
See Also:
RetryStrategy
